mapper.select: select s.single_id, s.single_title_en, s.single_title_jp, s.single_title_cn, s.single_artist, s.single_length, s.single_style, s.release_date, s.single_bpm from mug_single s where instr(s.single_artist, #{personId}) > 0
select * from mug_game g where g.game_id in (select s.game_id from mug_song s where s.single_id = #{singleId})
select s.song_id, s.game_id, s.single_id, s.song_title_en, s.song_artist from mug_song s where s.single_id = #{singleId}

select s.single_id, s.single_title_en, s.single_title_jp, s.single_title_cn, s.single_alias, s.single_artist, s.single_length, s.single_style, s.release_date, s.single_bpm, s.single_cast, if(s.single_lyric is null, 0, 1) single_lyric from mug_single s limit 100

select s.single_id, s.single_title_en, s.single_title_jp, s.single_title_cn, s.single_alias, s.single_artist, s.single_length, s.single_style, s.release_date, s.single_bpm, s.single_cast, if(s.single_lyric is null, 0, 1) single_lyric from mug_single s where instr(s.single_title_cn, #{search}) > 0 or instr(s.single_title_en, #{search}) > 0 or instr(s.single_title_jp, #{search}) > 0 or instr(s.single_artist, #{search}) > 0
